page.title: 05LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: After the war everything was more free and easy.Before the bypass was here there used to be a road through Bromsgrove which was the main road to Birmingham and down South.At weekends or holidays it was very hard to cross.Bromsgrove town has changed quite a lot,there used to be a lot of family buisnesses.Most were grocers lots have gone now.There were quite a lot of shops,not as many as today,they were smaller and there were no supermarkets like Fine Fare and all other shops were in one line.Bromsgrove used to be nearly all country but over the years about five new estates have been built.There used to be a cattle market every Tuesday where people would come from quite a long way.There used to be hundreds of different animals.He went to Finstall First school,he started when he was
